items.sentence: Tom said he didn't know why Mary was so angry.
This is something Tom and I are very proud of.
This is the book Tom and I were talking about.
Tom always seems to be wearing the same thing.
Tom and I are the ones who ought to apologize.
Tom and I aren't permitted to do that anymore.
Tom and I aren't very likely to sing together.
Tom and I weren't the only ones who were busy.
Tom and I enjoyed ourselves at a Mary's party.
Tom said he hopes that you'll be at the party.
Tom said he expected Mary to help him do that.
We dissected frogs in our biology class today.
Unfortunately, I can't help you at the moment.
Tom doesn't spend money on that kind of thing.
Your efforts will be rewarded in the long run.
We played football even though it was raining.
You didn't even notice that I got my hair cut.
He must have been named after his grandfather.
Tom and I both don't know how to speak French.
Both Tom and I don't know how to speak French.
